member.name: T:DALHelper.DBDataHelper
member.summary: The class houses the methods that can be used to pull and push data into a SQL Server database.

member.name: F:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.disposed
member.summary: The bool type disposed field is used to denote whether the user handled the object of DBDataHelper class for disposal, or whether the Garbage Collector handled the disposal.

member.name: M:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.ConnectToDB
member.summary: ConnectToDB method is used to connect to the database with the help of the ConnectionString property.
member.returns: Returns a open connection to the database.

member.name: M:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.InitializeCommand(System.String,DALHelper.SQLTextType,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter})
member.summary: The GetCommand method is used by public facing method(s) of the helper library.
member.param: The SQL query/stored Procedure passed in to be executed.
The enumerated value used to denote whether the passed in sql text is a sql query or a stored procedure.
The collection of parameters that the sql query/stored procedure requires in order to successfully execute.

member.name: M:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.ExecSQL(System.String,DALHelper.SQLTextType,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter})
member.summary: Executes a given SQL query or stored procedure.
member.param: The SQL query/stored procedure passed in to be executed.
The enumerated value used to denote whether the passed in sql text is a sql query or a stored procedure.
The collection of parameters that the sql query/ stored procedure requires in order to successfully execute.

member.summary: Executes a given SQL query or stored procedure.

member.name: M:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.Dispose
member.summary: Cleanas up the managed resources used by the library, namely the connection to the database and the command.

member.name: M:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.CleanUp(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes the clean up procedure for public method Dispose and for finalizer of the class. If passed true as the parameter, then performs the clean up of both managed and unmanaged resources. If passed false, then it means that garbage collector called up the finalizer and only the unmanaged resources need clean up.

member.name: M:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.Finalize
member.summary: The finalizer that will be activated by the garbage collector in the event the user fails to properly dispose off the object.

member.name: P:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.Command
member.summary: The Command property of is used internally by methods in the library.

member.name: P:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.Connection
member.summary: The Connection property is used internally by methods in the library.

member.name: P:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.DataTable
P:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.DataSet
member.summary: DataSet that can be publicly read, but only privately set. Used in methods that return dataset.

member.name: P:DALHelper.DBDataHelper.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets and sets the connection that is used to connect to the database. Implementation of dependency injection via property injection.

member.name: T:DALHelper.SQLTextType
member.summary: The enum is used to suggest whether the passed sql text is a SQL query or a stored procedure.

member.name: F:DALHelper.SQLTextType.Query
member.summary: Signifies that passed sql text is an ad hoc SQL query.

member.name: F:DALHelper.SQLTextType.Stored_Proc
member.summary: Signifies that passed sql text is a stored procedure.
